TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_alang_Tpiray, title = alang_Tpiray, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/alang_Tpiray} }

S.FORM: alang Tpiray : alang na Tpiray ga nya skura te llow na skura te tltuw pu'ing. knhulan na ita Tayal hiya ga kahul ta bih na Pinsbkan, ro hkngyan skura te tltuw, karow ro krayas rgyax "b'bu bayu" kwara. ryax haca ga knaki bih alang lela kwara cyoli na llyung Klesan, ro mpuw payat kwara alang cnrux kya. laney ta skal cikey cyu inu alang Tayal kwara bih llyung Klesan kya.

alang Tpiray : alang na Tpiray ga nya skora te llow na skora te tltow po'ing. knholan na ita Tayal hiya ga kahol ta bih na Pinsbkan, ro hkngyan skora te tltow, karow ro krayas rgyax "b'bo bayo" kwara. ryax haca ga knaki bih alang lela kwara cyoli na llyong Klesan, ro mpow payat kwara alang cnrox kya. laney ta skal cikey cyo ino alang Tayal kwara bih llyong Klesan kya.
